practice.title: Practice Areas
practice.subtitle: My practice revolves around trust, ethics, and commitment. Specializing in international, citizenship, and corporate law, I deliver results with care and precision. Your legal ally for a seamless journey through the complexities of the legal landscape. Explore the power of legal advocacy with me.

about.title: Helping to overcome and ease the legal burden.
about.subtitle: About me
about.description:
My name is Bárbara Barbizani de Carvalho, I have a client-oriented approach where trust, ethics, and commitment remain fundamental in building lasting business relationships. I only accept cases when I possess the level of knowledge and experience to provide prompt and excellent service. I operate locally with a global mindset, specializing in serving Portuguese, Brazilian, and Chinese companies and individuals.
I collaborate with companies and individuals with a partnership mindset, aligned with their goals and focused on optimizing value in their legal issues and disputes. I aim for clients to feel a high level of confidence that they have made the right choice in our partnership and respect their time.
I create a coherent process that not only delivers results of technical excellence but also does so quickly and robustly.

hero1.title: A Careful, Committed, and Dignified Approach to Law.
hero1.description: I'm here to help. As your legal partner, I provide personalized solutions that protect your interests and guide you to informed decisions. Let's work together to find clarity in legal matters. Schedule a consultation today and take the first step toward peace of mind.

contacts.title: Get in Touch for Expert Advice
contacts.subtitle: Contacts
contacts.description: Whether you're navigating complex legal issues or simply seeking guidance, I'm here to assist you. Let's embark on this journey together - your legal matters deserve the attention and expertise I provide. Get in touch today and experience personalized counsel that puts your needs first. Your concerns matter, and I'm committed to providing the expert advice you deserve. I look forward to hearing from you and addressing your legal needs with care and precision.

about.title: About
about.title2: Helping You To Overcome And Ease The Legal Burden.
about.description:
Lawyer and legal consultant, Member of the Portuguese Bar Association and Member of the Brazilian Bar Association.
PhD candidate in Legal and Civil Sciences - University of Law of Lisbon.
Master in Legal and Labor Sciences - University of Law of Lisbon.
Advanced specialist in Commercial and Labor Law by the Faculty of Law of the University of Lisbon.
Academic researcher with several articles and books published, highlighting the publication in Constitutional Law - Salary Reductibility and Principle of Non-Retrogression, in 2017.
Experienced in preventive consultancy and civil litigation, with active registration in the OAB and the Portuguese Bar Association.
Resident in Portugal for the last 12 years, but born in Brazil, she has worked in both countries, holding a deep understanding of their legal, cultural, and systemic differences.
She has a client-oriented approach, where trust, ethics, and commitment remain fundamental in creating lasting commercial relationships.
She operates locally with a global mindset, specializing in Portuguese, Brazilian, and Chinese companies and citizens. Coordinating migration processes, visas, Portuguese citizenship, real estate investment, company relocation, among other operations involving Portuguese and Brazilian jurisdictions.
In addition to extensive practice in legal consultancy and disputes in court for citizens and companies, she created the legal department of Grupo Abraito in Portugal.

PORTUGUESE BAR ASSOCIATION | No. 52419L

BRAZILIAN BAR ASSOCIATION PR | No. 63348

hero.title: Empowering You Through Expert Legal Services and Consulting
hero.description: I'm dedicated to providing expert advice and comprehensive consulting services tailored to your unique needs. Whether you're facing intricate legal challenges or simply seeking guidance, I am here to assist you. My commitment is to safeguard your interests and guide you towards well-informed decisions, ensuring you receive the highest level of professional expertise. Explore the range of services.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.formDescription: Whether you have questions, need assistance, or just want to connect, sending a direct message is a hassle-free way to get in touch with me. Simply click on the 'Send Message' button bellow, and share your thoughts, concerns, or inquiries. I value your communication and am dedicated to providing you with a prompt and helpful response.
contacts.description: Legal matters require prompt and reliable communication. Whether you have questions, need legal assistance, or want to schedule a consultation, I'm here to help. Feel free to get in touch through the following channels:

form.name: Name
form.success: Your message has been sent successfully. I will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for reaching out.

practiceAreas.title: Private International Law
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in emigration processes, Golden Visas in Portugal, Portuguese and Brazilian nationality, regularization and work in Portugal and Brazil, document research, translation and certification of foreign documents, recognition of foreign judgments, regularization of assets, inheritances, and property transfer in Portugal and Brazil, judicial appeals against administrative decisions.

practiceAreas.title: Real Estate Law
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in real estate due diligence, drafting and review of purchase and sale contracts, conflicts involving false powers of attorney, breach of fiduciary duty, risk mitigation in leasing, representation in assemblies and supervision of properties in plural ownership, licensing, licensing with municipalities, judicial appeals against administrative decisions, judicial representation in property disputes such as leasing, eviction, dispossession, property claims, repossession, and adverse possession.

practiceAreas.title: Tax Law
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in tax optimization, financial planning, tax obligations, income tax return, transnational taxation, advice on tax residence and double-taxation regimes, definitive departure from Brazil, non-habitual resident status, judicial appeals against tax executions.

practiceAreas.title: Labor Law
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in contractual advice and negotiation of working conditions, consultancy and negotiation in case of dismissals, labor calculations of benefits and compensations, communications in case of disconnection and leaves with or without pay, labor litigation and judicial sponsorship.

practiceAreas.title: Family Law
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in drafting prenuptial agreements, assistance and representation in marriages between foreign spouses, proxy marriage, transcription of marriages that occurred abroad, approval and recognition of common-law unions, drafting of common-law union contracts, consensual and litigious divorce, divorce conference, parental power regulation, judicial representation in cases of parental alienation and international child abduction, judicial representation in probate and division proceedings.

practiceAreas.title: Civil Law
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in drafting and understanding contracts, validation of conditions, rules, and clauses of commercial legal transactions in general, construction contracts, intellectual property, copyright, and conflicts arising from electronic business and custom software production, insolvency and default, civil liability and corporate liability, representation in judicial proceedings.

practiceAreas.title: General Civil Law
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in drafting and reviewing contracts, debt collection, judicial representation in debt collection processes, judicial representation in processes against insurers, judicial representation in processes against airlines.

practiceAreas.title: Labor Law & Unions
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in drafting and analysis of employment contracts, how to properly dismiss employees, advice, calculations, and negotiation, consultancy in subcontracting, consultancy in company's ancillary obligations to employees, resolution of labor disputes, judicial representation, and negotiations.

practiceAreas.title: Civil Law
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in drafting and understanding contracts, validation of conditions, rules, and clauses of commercial legal transactions in general, construction contracts, intellectual property, copyright, and conflicts arising from electronic business and custom software production, insolvency and default, civil liability and corporate liability, representation in judicial proceedings.

practiceAreas.title: Commercial Law
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in the creation and registration of companies, assemblies, assignments, mergers, closure, and sale of commercial companies, licensing of activities, joint venture regime, adherence to current regulations, mitigation of legal risks, franchise contracts.

practiceAreas.title: Intellectual Property
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in the registration and protection of trademarks and patents, licensing and royalties contracts, patents and utility models, marketing and transfer of IP, disputes and IP assessment, judicial representation in industrial property and copyright conflicts.

practiceAreas.title: Tax Consulting
practiceAreas.description: Specialization in tax optimization, financial planning, tax obligations, collective income tax return, transnational taxation, dividends, advice on tax residence and double-taxation regimes, judicial appeals against tax executions.

feedback.author: Sofia Pimenta
feedback.feedback: From the very first moment I met Bárbara Barbizani, her blend of warmth and professionalism was immediately apparent. Her unparalleled competence sets her apart, making her an exceptional choice for legal representation. She's a dedicated ally who genuinely cares about your well-being. She is truly exceptional.

feedback.author: André Rodrigo
feedback.feedback: Bárbara Barbizani epitomizes professionalism, warmth, and unmatched competence. Under her guidance, I confidently navigated through complex legal matters, secure in the knowledge that she had my best interests at heart. Barbara's dedication and expertise are unmatched, and her compassionate approach sets her apart. With Barbara by your side, you're not just getting a lawyer - you're gaining a trusted ally who will go above and beyond to ensure your success.

feedback.author: Betina Ferreira
feedback.feedback: Barbara Barbizani is an exceptional lawyer whose talent shines through her heartwarming approach. She not only fights for you with unwavering dedication but also instills trust in your decisions and offers empathy throughout the process. A true advocate in every sense. Thank you for helping me in my case and for being a reliable partner throughout the journey. I highly recommend Barbara to anyone seeking legal representation.

articles.title: Salary Reductibility and Prohibition of Retrogression
articles.description: Equipped with scientific courage and audacity, the author proposes a deconstruction of the principle of prohibition of retrogression - which should not be an absolute principle, since Law is not a science that deals with the absolute as a rule - in order to place it in its proper place by reducing it to the meaning that is proper to it on the scale of values of labor law institutions. Thus, to the extent of the practical ineffectiveness, she bridges to juridical rationality to highlight the dogmatic incongruence underlying the aforementioned principle.

articles.title: Disregard of Legal Personality in the Limited Liability Company
articles.description: The recourse to disregard of legal personality must be moderate as a mobile pendulum so that it becomes a truly credible, rational, and fair resource of the socio-economic model, acting as a mitigator of systemic deviations and an inducer of confidence in economic operation, but with transparent, analytically determinable, and formally expressed criteria, dispensing with the ambiguity that arbitrariness can cause. If so, instead of generating the annihilation of legal personality, this recourse will enhance the collective institute, through the pursuit only of lawful social purposes, preventing the misuse of corporate figures.

articles.title: Margins of the Judge in the Face of Restrictions on the Fundamental Right to Remuneration
articles.description: As a Fundamental Right, remunerative guarantee is a trump against political majority and, thus, acts as an armor against interventions that affect the degree of realization underlying it, since legislative realizations decrease the degree of abstraction and generality of the norm and increase the judge's control margin in the face of a restriction, through the integration of the content carried out with the fundamental guarantee.

articles.title: Amendment to the 2009 Labor Code
articles.description: Notwithstanding the personal nature and importance of this element in the individual labor situation, since work does not exist, there are people who work, work is, from the economic standpoint of companies, a factor of production that must be attractive so that it can be sought after. This does not mean that work can be pursued at all costs in the logic of absolute optimization of competitiveness and employability, but rather that in any economic situation it should always assume a captive place.
